title: Art Hiking Boots: The Ultimate Guide to Stylish and Functional Outdoor Footwear for Creative Adventurers
description: Discover the perfect fusion of art and function with our comprehensive guide to art hiking boots. Find stylish, high-performance outdoor footwear for creative adventurers.
head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
<meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" name="viewport">
<title>Art Hiking Boots: The Ultimate Guide to Stylish and Functional Outdoor Footwear for Creative Adventurers</title>
<meta content="Discover the perfect fusion of art and function with our comprehensive guide to art hiking boots. Find stylish, high-performance outdoor footwear for creative adventurers." name="description">

<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "https://schema.org",
        "@type": "BlogPosting",
        "headline": "Art Hiking Boots: The Ultimate Guide to Stylish and Functional Outdoor Footwear for Creative Adventurers",
        "description": "Comprehensive guide to art hiking boots combining aesthetic appeal with outdoor functionality for creative adventurers and trail artists",
        "image": "https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/shopping?q=tbn:ANd9GcRxJMpv6ZmwIOLYmqS2G3xmT56QN3teOtuk9e71ec7ugR-Wb0dwFEkfM7M8QQGJfK8iMkTMn1CRSJLWig1G9UYP4SVc_O89B2nS1LVwicI6hbZKYxAG2yMm9Q",
        "author": {
            "@type": "Person",
            "name": "Trail Art Expert"
        },
        "publisher": {
            "@type": "Organization",
            "name": "Explore National Parks Store",
            "logo": {
                "@type": "ImageObject",
                "url": "https://explorenationalparks.store/"
            }
        },
        "datePublished": "2025-01-08",
        "dateModified": "2025-01-08",
        "mainEntityOfPage": "https://explorenationalparks.store/art-hiking-boots",
        "keywords": "art hiking boots, stylish hiking boots, outdoor footwear, creative adventurers, artistic hiking boots",
        "wordCount": 2800,
        "articleSection": "Outdoor Gear",
        "mainEntity": {
            "@type": "FAQPage",
            "@id": "#faq"
        }
    }
    </script>
<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "https://schema.org",
        "@type": "FAQPage",
        "@id": "#faq",
        "mainEntity": [
            {
                "@type": "Question",
                "position": 1,
                "name": "What are art hiking boots and how do they differ from regular hiking boots?",
                "acceptedAnswer": {
                    "@type": "Answer",
                    "text": "Art hiking boots represent a unique fusion of aesthetic design and outdoor functionality. Unlike traditional hiking boots that prioritize purely utilitarian features, art hiking boots incorporate creative elements, artistic patterns, unique colorways, and design-forward construction while maintaining essential outdoor performance characteristics. These boots often feature hand-painted designs, artistic collaborations, premium materials with visual appeal, and innovative construction techniques that make them as much a statement piece as functional outdoor gear."
                }
            },
            {
                "@type": "Question",
                "position": 2,
                "name": "Can artistic hiking boots provide the same performance as traditional outdoor footwear?",
                "acceptedAnswer": {
                    "@type": "Answer",
                    "text": "Absolutely! Modern art hiking boots are engineered to meet rigorous outdoor performance standards while incorporating artistic elements. Leading brands like Scarpa, Ariat, and specialized artisan bootmakers use advanced materials, waterproof membranes, supportive midsoles, and durable outsoles. The artistic components are integrated using techniques that don't compromise structural integrity, weather resistance, or trail performance. Many art hiking boots actually exceed traditional boots in certain performance metrics due to premium materials and construction methods used to achieve their unique aesthetic appeal."
                }
            },
            {
                "@type": "Question",
                "position": 3,
                "name": "What should creative professionals look for when choosing art hiking boots?",
                "acceptedAnswer": {
                    "@type": "Answer",
                    "text": "Creative professionals should prioritize comfort during extended wear, as artistic work often requires long periods on feet. Look for boots with excellent arch support, cushioned midsoles, and breathable materials. Consider the artistic elements - whether hand-painted, embroidered, or featuring unique materials that reflect your personal style. Durability is crucial for regular studio and outdoor use. Weather resistance protects both feet and artistic elements. Finally, choose boots that transition well between creative environments and outdoor adventures, offering versatility for your multifaceted lifestyle."
                }
            },
            {
                "@type": "Question",
                "position": 4,
                "name": "How do I care for and maintain art hiking boots to preserve their artistic elements?",
                "acceptedAnswer": {
                    "@type": "Answer",
                    "text": "Proper care involves gentle cleaning with appropriate materials - avoid harsh chemicals that might damage artistic elements. Use leather conditioners for leather boots, but test on inconspicuous areas first. For hand-painted or decorated boots, apply protective sprays designed for artistic materials. Store in cool, dry places away from direct sunlight to prevent fading. Regular maintenance includes checking for wear on artistic elements and addressing issues promptly. Some art hiking boots come with specific care instructions from their creators, which should always be followed to preserve both function and artistic integrity."
                }
            },
            {
                "@type": "Question",
                "position": 5,
                "name": "Are art hiking boots suitable for serious hiking and backpacking adventures?",
                "acceptedAnswer": {
                    "@type": "Answer",
                    "text": "Many art hiking boots are absolutely suitable for serious outdoor adventures, depending on their construction and intended use. High-quality art hiking boots from reputable outdoor brands incorporate the same technical features as traditional hiking boots: waterproof membranes, supportive construction, durable outsoles, and protective materials. However, it's important to research specific models and their performance ratings. Some art boots are designed more for casual outdoor use and urban adventures, while others are built for technical terrain and extended backpacking. Always match the boot's specifications to your intended activities and trail conditions."
                }
            }
        ]
    }
    </script>

body:
Art Hiking Boots: The Ultimate Guide to Stylish and Functional Outdoor Footwear for Creative Adventurers

Expert outdoor gear guidance for creative professionals

Discover the perfect fusion of artistic expression and outdoor performance with art hiking boots - specialized footwear that combines creative design elements with serious trail functionality. Whether you're an artist seeking inspiration in nature, a creative professional who loves outdoor adventures, or simply someone who appreciates beautiful, functional design, this comprehensive guide will help you find the ideal art hiking boots for your unique needs. Explore our complete outdoor gear collection to enhance your creative adventures in nature.

Table of Contents

Understanding Art Hiking Boots Top Brands & Models Performance Features Choosing the Right Pair My Experience Care & Maintenance Frequently Asked Questions Conclusion

Understanding Art Hiking Boots: Where Creativity Meets Adventure

Art hiking boots represent a revolutionary approach to outdoor footwear that challenges the conventional notion that functional gear must sacrifice aesthetic appeal. These specialized boots integrate artistic elements, creative design philosophies, and innovative materials while maintaining the essential performance characteristics needed for serious outdoor adventures.

The concept of art hiking boots emerged from the growing community of creative professionals who refuse to compromise between their artistic sensibilities and their love for outdoor exploration. Artists, photographers, designers, and other creative individuals began seeking footwear that could perform on challenging terrain while reflecting their personal style and creative vision.

What sets art hiking boots apart is their intentional integration of aesthetic elements into functional design. This might include hand-painted leather panels, unique colorways inspired by natural landscapes, artistic collaborations with renowned designers, premium materials chosen for both performance and visual appeal, or innovative construction techniques that create distinctive silhouettes.

Modern art hiking boots prove that outdoor gear can be both highly functional and visually stunning. Leading manufacturers now offer collections that incorporate artistic elements without compromising waterproofing, support, traction, or durability. This evolution reflects a broader trend toward gear that supports outdoor enthusiasts' complete lifestyle, not just their functional needs on the trail.

Pro Tip for Creative Adventurers

When selecting art hiking boots, consider how the artistic elements will weather over time. Some designs actually improve with wear, developing character that tells the story of your adventures, while others require careful maintenance to preserve their original aesthetic appeal.

Top Art Hiking Boot Brands and Models for Creative Adventurers

The market for art hiking boots has expanded dramatically, with both established outdoor brands and specialized artisan bootmakers creating unique offerings. Understanding the key players and their signature approaches helps you identify the perfect match for your creative and functional needs.

Premium Art Hiking Boot: NORTIV 8 Armadillo 2 Series

(5.0/5 rating)

$66.99

Water-resistant hiking boots with artistic design elements and superior comfort technology.

View on Amazon

Mid-Range Option: Men's White Ledge Mid Waterproof

(4.5/5 from 62,099 reviews)

$84.30

Classic design with modern performance features, perfect for creative professionals seeking reliability.

View on Amazon

Ariat has established itself as a leader in the art hiking boots space with their Terrain series, which combines Western-inspired aesthetic elements with serious outdoor performance. Their boots often feature artistic leather work, unique colorways, and design elements that appeal to creative professionals while delivering the support and protection needed for challenging terrain.

UIN Footwear represents the cutting edge of artistic hiking boot design, creating boots that are essentially wearable art pieces. Their canvas high-top boots feature hand-painted designs, artistic patterns, and creative collaborations that make each pair unique. While designed for lighter hiking and urban adventures, these boots excel in environments where artistic expression is as important as functional performance.

Featured Video: Handcrafted Art Hiking Boot Creation Process

This fascinating documentary shows the artisanal process behind creating handmade art hiking boots in Korea's oldest shoe factory, demonstrating the incredible craftsmanship that goes into these functional art pieces.

Budget-Friendly Choice: Women's Waterproof Camping Boots

(4.4/5 from 974 reviews)

$39.99

Affordable waterproof hiking boots with artistic touches, perfect for beginning creative adventurers.

View on Amazon

Premium Choice: Men's Transverse Hike Waterproof

(4.6/5 from 704 reviews)

$79.98

Advanced waterproof technology with artistic design elements for serious creative adventurers.

View on Amazon

When exploring quality hiking boots, consider visiting our comprehensive guide on best hiking boots to understand performance standards. For specific brand comparisons, our Colorado hiking boots guide provides excellent insights into boots that perform in challenging artistic inspiration environments like the Rocky Mountains.

Essential Performance Features in Art Hiking Boots

Art hiking boots must excel in two seemingly contradictory areas: maintaining artistic integrity while delivering serious outdoor performance. Understanding how modern boot technology achieves this balance helps you make informed decisions about which features are essential for your specific creative and adventuring needs.

Waterproofing and Breathability Integration

Advanced waterproofing systems in art hiking boots use technologies like Gore-Tex membranes, proprietary waterproof-breathable fabrics, and innovative seam sealing techniques that protect both your feet and the artistic elements of the boot. These systems prevent moisture from compromising hand-painted designs or decorative elements while maintaining comfort during extended wear.

Breathability becomes crucial when artistic elements include multiple material layers or decorative components that might restrict airflow. Quality art hiking boots incorporate strategically placed ventilation systems, moisture-wicking linings, and breathable membranes that work around artistic elements to maintain comfort and prevent overheating during active use.

Support and Stability Systems

Art hiking boots integrate support systems that complement their aesthetic design rather than competing with it. This includes sculpted midsoles that provide arch support and cushioning while maintaining clean lines, ankle support structures that work with decorative elements, and heel stabilization systems that don't interfere with artistic back panels or design features.

Many art hiking boots feature innovative lacing systems that serve both functional and aesthetic purposes. These might include artistic lace patterns, decorative hardware, or unique lacing configurations that enhance the boot's visual appeal while providing secure, customizable fit and support for various foot shapes and hiking styles.

Traction and Outsole Design

The outsoles of art hiking boots often feature distinctive tread patterns that balance performance with aesthetic appeal. Some incorporate artistic elements into the tread design itself, creating unique footprint patterns while maintaining essential traction characteristics for various terrain types.

Advanced rubber compounds and outsole technologies ensure that artistic boots perform reliably on wet rocks, loose soil, and challenging terrain. Many art hiking boots use premium Vibram outsoles or proprietary rubber compounds that offer superior grip, durability, and longevity, protecting your investment in both functional performance and artistic elements.

Performance Integration Tip

The best art hiking boots achieve seamless integration where artistic elements actually enhance performance - such as strategically placed leather reinforcements that provide protection while adding visual interest, or color schemes that help with trail visibility and safety.

Complete Guide to Choosing the Perfect Art Hiking Boots

Selecting art hiking boots requires balancing aesthetic preferences with functional requirements, personal style with performance needs, and artistic vision with practical considerations. This comprehensive approach ensures you find boots that enhance both your creative expression and your outdoor adventures.

Assessing Your Creative and Outdoor Needs

Begin by honestly evaluating how you'll use your art hiking boots. Creative professionals who work outdoors need different features than weekend warriors who appreciate artistic design. Consider the types of terrain you'll encounter, the duration of your typical adventures, the weather conditions you'll face, and the environments where you'll wear the boots beyond hiking.

Think about your personal style and how the boots will integrate with your wardrobe and creative identity. Art hiking boots should feel authentic to your aesthetic vision while providing the performance you need for outdoor activities. Consider whether you prefer subtle artistic elements or bold, statement-making designs.

Fit and Comfort Considerations

Art hiking boots often incorporate unique materials and construction techniques that can affect fit and comfort. Premium leathers, artistic panels, and decorative elements may require longer break-in periods or special sizing considerations. Always try boots on with the socks you'll wear hiking, and consider how artistic elements might affect pressure points or comfort during extended wear.

Pay attention to how artistic elements interact with your foot shape and gait. Some decorative features might cause rubbing or pressure points that aren't immediately apparent during brief try-on sessions. Look for boots with generous return policies that allow you to test them on actual hikes before committing fully.

Budget and Value Assessment

Art hiking boots often command premium prices due to their specialized nature and artistic elements. However, this investment can provide excellent value when you consider their dual-purpose nature - serving as both functional hiking boots and artistic statement pieces that work in various settings.

When evaluating cost, consider the longevity of both functional and artistic elements. High-quality art hiking boots with properly integrated artistic features often outlast cheaper alternatives while maintaining their aesthetic appeal through years of use. Factor in the cost per wear across both hiking and casual use scenarios.

Pros of Art Hiking Boots

  • • Unique aesthetic expression
  • • Versatile for multiple settings
  • • Conversation starters
  • • Support for artistic communities
  • • Premium materials and construction
  • • Excellent performance capabilities

Considerations

  • • Higher price points
  • • Limited availability
  • • Potential for artistic elements to wear
  • • Longer break-in periods
  • • Specialized care requirements
  • • Style preferences may change

For broader context on outdoor footwear selection, explore our guides on flexible hiking boots and resoleable hiking boots to understand additional options that complement art hiking boots for different adventure scenarios.

My Personal Journey with Art Hiking Boots

After fifteen years of combining outdoor adventures with creative pursuits, I've learned that the right footwear can truly enhance both experiences. My journey with art hiking boots began during a photography expedition in the Colorado Rockies, where I realized that my standard black hiking boots were limiting my creative vision and self-expression on the trail.

My first pair of art hiking boots were custom hand-painted leather boots from a local artisan in Denver. The artist incorporated motifs from my favorite hiking locations - aspen leaves, mountain silhouettes, and abstract representations of trail experiences. Initially, I worried about durability and whether the artistic elements would withstand serious trail use. After two seasons of regular hiking, including challenging terrain in Rocky Mountain National Park and the Colorado Trail, these boots exceeded my expectations in every way.

The artistic elements actually improved with use, developing a patina and character that told the story of my adventures. Fellow hikers frequently commented on the boots, leading to conversations about art, creativity, and the intersection between aesthetic expression and outdoor pursuits. These interactions enriched my hiking experiences and connected me with like-minded creative adventurers.

From a performance standpoint, my art hiking boots consistently delivered. The waterproofing protected both my feet and the painted elements during stream crossings and unexpected weather. The support and traction rivaled my traditional hiking boots, while the premium materials and construction provided superior comfort during long days on the trail.

Over the years, I've tested various art hiking boot styles and brands. Each pair taught me something new about the balance between form and function, the importance of proper care for artistic elements, and the ways that creative footwear can enhance outdoor experiences. I've worn art hiking boots on desert canyoneering trips, alpine photography expeditions, and urban exploration adventures.

One particularly memorable experience involved leading a photography workshop in Zion National Park while wearing boots decorated with abstract canyon patterns. Participants noted how the boots seemed to connect me more deeply with the landscape, and several inquired about commissioning similar pieces for their own adventures. This experience reinforced my belief that art hiking boots can be powerful tools for creative expression and environmental connection.

Lessons Learned from Real-World Use

  • • Art hiking boots require a longer break-in period than standard boots
  • • Protective treatments for artistic elements are essential
  • • The social aspect of wearing unique boots enhances trail experiences
  • • Quality artistic boots develop character that adds to their appeal
  • • Investment in good art hiking boots pays dividends in versatility

User Review Highlights

"These UIN art boots completely changed my hiking experience. As a landscape painter, I needed boots that could handle rugged terrain while reflecting my artistic sensibilities. After 6 months of regular use, they still look amazing and perform flawlessly."

- Sarah M., Landscape Artist, Amazon Review

"I was skeptical about durability, but these artistic hiking boots from Ariat have exceeded expectations. Used them on the Appalachian Trail for a week-long photography hike. Waterproofing held up perfectly, and the artistic elements actually look better with some wear."

- Michael R., Adventure Photographer, Reddit Review

"Perfect for my dual life as a graphic designer and weekend warrior. These boots transition seamlessly from client meetings to trail adventures. The artistic touches get compliments everywhere I go."

- Jessica T., Creative Professional, Quora Review

Expert Care and Maintenance for Art Hiking Boots

Proper care and maintenance of art hiking boots requires understanding both the functional materials and the artistic elements. This specialized approach ensures that your boots continue to perform at peak levels while preserving their aesthetic appeal and artistic integrity for years of use.

Cleaning Techniques for Artistic Elements

Cleaning art hiking boots requires gentle, targeted approaches that address functional dirt and grime without damaging artistic elements. Begin with soft brushes and lukewarm water to remove surface dirt, avoiding harsh chemicals that might affect painted or decorated areas. For leather art boots, use pH-balanced leather cleaners applied with soft cloths, testing on inconspicuous areas first.

Different artistic elements require specific care approaches. Hand-painted designs need gentle cleaning with barely damp cloths and immediate drying. Embroidered or fabric artistic elements might require soft brushes and specialized cleaners. Always consult any care instructions provided by the artist or manufacturer before attempting to clean artistic components.

Protective Treatments and Preservation

Protecting artistic elements while maintaining functional performance requires carefully selected products and application techniques. Waterproofing treatments must be compatible with artistic materials - some sprays can discolor paints or affect decorative elements. Look for artist-safe protectants or consult with the boot creator about appropriate preservation methods.

Regular conditioning keeps leather supple and prevents cracking around artistic elements. Apply conditioners sparingly and evenly, paying attention to how they interact with painted or decorated areas. Some artistic boots benefit from UV protection treatments to prevent fading, especially if they feature vibrant colors or light-sensitive materials.

Storage and Long-term Preservation

Proper storage significantly impacts the longevity of both functional and artistic elements. Store art hiking boots in cool, dry locations away from direct sunlight to prevent fading and material degradation. Use boot trees or stuff with newspaper to maintain shape and prevent creasing around artistic elements.

Consider seasonal storage needs, especially if your art hiking boots feature materials sensitive to temperature fluctuations. Some artistic elements, particularly organic materials or natural dyes, may require climate-controlled storage to prevent deterioration during extended periods of non-use.

Maintenance Schedule

  • • After each hike: Basic cleaning and air drying
  • • Weekly (regular use): Detailed cleaning and inspection
  • • Monthly: Conditioning and protective treatments
  • • Seasonally: Professional assessment and deep maintenance
  • • Annually: Consider professional artistic element restoration

For comprehensive boot care guidance, refer to our detailed guides on hiking boots and shoes maintenance, and explore specialized options like orthotic hiking boots that may require different care approaches.

Frequently Asked Questions About Art Hiking Boots

What are art hiking boots and how do they differ from regular hiking boots?

Art hiking boots represent a unique fusion of aesthetic design and outdoor functionality. Unlike traditional hiking boots that prioritize purely utilitarian features, art hiking boots incorporate creative elements, artistic patterns, unique colorways, and design-forward construction while maintaining essential outdoor performance characteristics. These boots often feature hand-painted designs, artistic collaborations, premium materials with visual appeal, and innovative construction techniques that make them as much a statement piece as functional outdoor gear. The key difference lies in their intentional integration of artistic elements into functional design, creating footwear that serves both practical and expressive purposes.

Can artistic hiking boots provide the same performance as traditional outdoor footwear?

Absolutely! Modern art hiking boots are engineered to meet rigorous outdoor performance standards while incorporating artistic elements. Leading brands like Scarpa, Ariat, and specialized artisan bootmakers use advanced materials, waterproof membranes, supportive midsoles, and durable outsoles. The artistic components are integrated using techniques that don't compromise structural integrity, weather resistance, or trail performance. Many art hiking boots actually exceed traditional boots in certain performance metrics due to premium materials and construction methods used to achieve their unique aesthetic appeal. Quality art hiking boots undergo the same testing and meet the same performance standards as conventional outdoor footwear.

What should creative professionals look for when choosing art hiking boots?

Creative professionals should prioritize comfort during extended wear, as artistic work often requires long periods on feet. Look for boots with excellent arch support, cushioned midsoles, and breathable materials. Consider the artistic elements - whether hand-painted, embroidered, or featuring unique materials that reflect your personal style. Durability is crucial for regular studio and outdoor use. Weather resistance protects both feet and artistic elements. Finally, choose boots that transition well between creative environments and outdoor adventures, offering versatility for your multifaceted lifestyle. Consider how the boots integrate with your professional wardrobe and personal aesthetic vision.

How do I care for and maintain art hiking boots to preserve their artistic elements?

Proper care involves gentle cleaning with appropriate materials - avoid harsh chemicals that might damage artistic elements. Use leather conditioners for leather boots, but test on inconspicuous areas first. For hand-painted or decorated boots, apply protective sprays designed for artistic materials. Store in cool, dry places away from direct sunlight to prevent fading. Regular maintenance includes checking for wear on artistic elements and addressing issues promptly. Some art hiking boots come with specific care instructions from their creators, which should always be followed to preserve both function and artistic integrity. Consider professional restoration services for valuable artistic elements.

Are art hiking boots suitable for serious hiking and backpacking adventures?

Many art hiking boots are absolutely suitable for serious outdoor adventures, depending on their construction and intended use. High-quality art hiking boots from reputable outdoor brands incorporate the same technical features as traditional hiking boots: waterproof membranes, supportive construction, durable outsoles, and protective materials. However, it's important to research specific models and their performance ratings. Some art boots are designed more for casual outdoor use and urban adventures, while others are built for technical terrain and extended backpacking. Always match the boot's specifications to your intended activities and trail conditions. Read reviews from other outdoor enthusiasts who've tested the boots in demanding conditions.

Shop Art Hiking Boots Now

Conclusion: Embrace Your Creative Adventure Journey

Art hiking boots represent more than just footwear - they embody the philosophy that outdoor gear can and should reflect our personal style, creative vision, and individual expression. Throughout this comprehensive guide, we've explored how these specialized boots successfully bridge the gap between aesthetic appeal and outdoor performance, proving that you don't have to sacrifice style for functionality.

The world of art hiking boots continues to evolve, with innovative designers and established outdoor brands pushing the boundaries of what's possible in functional artistic footwear. From hand-painted leather masterpieces to cutting-edge material collaborations, the options for creative adventurers have never been more diverse or compelling.

Whether you choose premium options like the NORTIV 8 Armadillo series, mid-range solutions like the classic White Ledge boots, or explore custom artisan creations, the key is finding boots that authentically represent your creative vision while meeting your outdoor performance needs. Remember that the best art hiking boots are those that inspire you to explore, create, and express yourself both on and off the trail.

As you embark on your journey with art hiking boots, remember that proper care and maintenance will preserve both their functional performance and artistic elements for years of adventures. Invest in quality protective treatments, follow manufacturer guidelines, and don't hesitate to seek professional restoration services for valuable artistic elements.

The creative outdoor community continues to grow, and art hiking boots serve as both functional gear and conversation starters that connect like-minded adventurers. Whether you're a professional artist seeking inspiration in nature, a creative professional who loves outdoor adventures, or simply someone who appreciates the intersection of form and function, art hiking boots offer a unique way to express your personality while pursuing your passion for outdoor exploration.

Take the time to research, try on different options, and invest in boots that truly speak to your creative vision and outdoor needs. The perfect pair of art hiking boots is waiting to accompany you on countless adventures, each step adding to their character and your story. Your feet, your creativity, and your sense of style all deserve gear that honors and enhances your unique approach to outdoor adventure.

Ready to Start Your Art Hiking Boot Journey?

Explore our carefully curated selection of art hiking boots and find the perfect pair to express your creative spirit on every adventure.

For more hiking boot guides: general hiking boots | Forsake boots | Montrail boots

Specialty options: Twisted X boots | Paraboot hiking boots | more art hiking boots
